title: Specialist Software Engineer Java
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Role: Specialist Software EngineerLocation: PuneType: Fulltime
Mode: Hybrid
 
Responsibilities:
 Understand and keep up to date with the product architecture.
 Analytical model development using Tibco Streaming/Streambase framework
 Review design and code developed by team to adhere to the project coding and quality     standards.
 Ensure technical deliveries meet quality and timeliness KPI’s.
 Participate in resolving production issues.
 Ensure software meets all requirements of quality, security, maintainability, extensibility etc.
 Provide technical guidance and coaching to developers and engineers.
 Develop Unit tests using frameworks
 Work with mindset to bring in continuous improvements in the team and deliver value adds.
 Guide team to debug critical issues and create RCA’s.
 Should communicate effectively all concepts and guidelines to development team.
 Follow agile development practices.
Skills and Experience required
B.Tech in Computer Science, Information Technology/Electronic Engineering
8+ years of experience
Strong in Java and OOPS concept
Strong in DB development ( MS SQL / Oracle )
Working experience on AWS ( or any other cloud ) is favorable
Working knowledge on writing complex SQL queries and query optimization
Knowledge of core Java , experience with Spring and REST , Experience with multi-threading
Knowledge about DevOps tools ( Jenkins / ansible / Terraform )
Preferably having good knowledge of Actimize frameworks like AIS & RCM(Actone)
Preferably having analytical Model Development Experience in Tibco Streambase.
Experienced working on Linux and/or Unix
Have excellent communication skills.
Be a self-motivated, rapid learner with an active interest in the latest tools, technologies and processes.
Experience working in Agile
Education Qualification:
Knowledge of Actimize AIS, RCM and UDM tools
Hands on coding experience in any software development or scripting language
Domain knowledge - Capital Markets / Trading / Fraud Detections / Compliance
About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.

questions.label: Do you have any first degree/blood relatives working at NICE?
Do you hold any other offers?
Open to hybrid mode of work? (2 days office, 3 days WFH)
Relevant Skill related to the Job?
